name: HYPERCHARGE: Unboxed
description: You're a small plastic soldier with a big mission. That mission? Construct turrets, build defenses, protect the HYPER-CORE! The biggest battles require the smallest soldiers.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9550 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 640 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: HYPERCHARGE: Unboxed is an Early Access game, minimum specs may change throughout development
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
